AcceptInvitation.name: AcceptInvitation
AcceptInvitation.description: Grants permission to accept an invitation to become a member of a behavior graph

CreateGraph.name: CreateGraph
CreateGraph.description: Grants permission to create a behavior graph and begin to aggregate security information

CreateMembers.name: CreateMembers
CreateMembers.description:
Grants permission to request the membership of one or more accounts in a behavior
                                                graph managed by this account

DeleteGraph.name: DeleteGraph
DeleteGraph.description: Grants permission to delete a behavior graph and stop aggregating security information

DeleteMembers.name: DeleteMembers
DeleteMembers.description:
Grants permission to remove member accounts from a behavior graph managed by this
                                                account

DisassociateMembership.name: DisassociateMembership
DisassociateMembership.description: Grants permission to remove the association of this account with a behavior graph

GetFreeTrialEligibility.name: GetFreeTrialEligibility
GetFreeTrialEligibility.description: Grants permission to retrieve a behavior graph's eligibility for a free trial period

GetGraphIngestState.name: GetGraphIngestState
GetGraphIngestState.description: Grants permission to retrieve the data ingestion state of a behavior graph

GetMembers.name: GetMembers
GetMembers.description: Grants permission to retrieve details on specified members of a behavior graph

GetPricingInformation.name: GetPricingInformation
GetPricingInformation.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about Amazon Detective's pricing

GetUsageInformation.name: GetUsageInformation
GetUsageInformation.description: Grants permission to list usage information of a behavior graph

ListGraphs.name: ListGraphs
ListGraphs.description: Grants permission to list behavior graphs managed by this account

ListInvitations.name: ListInvitations
ListInvitations.description:
Grants permission to retrieve details on the behavior graphs to which this account
                                                has been invited to join

ListMembers.name: ListMembers
ListMembers.description: Grants permission to retrieve details on all members of a behavior graph

RejectInvitation.name: RejectInvitation
RejectInvitation.description: Grants permission to reject an invitation to become a member of a behavior graph

SearchGraph.name: SearchGraph
SearchGraph.description: Grants permission to search the data stored in a behavior graph

StartMonitoringMember.name: StartMonitoringMember
StartMonitoringMember.description: Grants permission to start data ingest for a member account that has a status of ACCEPTED_BUT_DISABLED.
